other_tests.findings: Hypodense fluid collection with a mildly thickened enhancing wall in the right lower quadrant concerning for abscess; fluid filled and dilated appendix with wall hyperemia; 7.5 x 6.1 x 5.0 cm fluid collection in the pelvis concerning for abscess.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The 8 mm lingular nodule is unchanged; three small hepatic hypodensities in the left lobe unchanged; left parapelvic cysts noted again; previously identified pelvic fluid has developed into the current fluid collection concerning for abscess.

other_tests.findings: 1+ PMNs (<1 per 1000X FIELD); no microorganisms seen.
